toggleOptions.title: Toggle Options
toggleOptions.desc: Open and close the options panel

toggleGallery.title: Toggle Gallery
toggleGallery.desc: Open and close the gallery drawer

maximizeWorkSpace.title: Maximize Workspace
maximizeWorkSpace.desc: Close panels and maximize work area

setPrompt.title: Set Prompt
setPrompt.desc: Use the prompt of the current image

setSeed.title: Set Seed
setSeed.desc: Use the seed of the current image

setParameters.title: Set Parameters
setParameters.desc: Use all parameters of the current image

showInfo.title: Show Info
showInfo.desc: Show metadata info of the current image

sendToImageToImage.title: Send To Image To Image
sendToImageToImage.desc: Send current image to Image to Image

previousImage.title: Previous Image
previousImage.desc: Display the previous image in gallery

nextImage.title: Next Image
nextImage.desc: Display the next image in gallery

toggleGalleryPin.title: Toggle Gallery Pin
toggleGalleryPin.desc: Pins and unpins the gallery to the UI

decreaseBrushSize.title: Decrease Brush Size
decreaseBrushSize.desc: Decreases the size of the canvas brush/eraser

increaseBrushSize.title: Increase Brush Size
increaseBrushSize.desc: Increases the size of the canvas brush/eraser

decreaseBrushOpacity.title: Decrease Brush Opacity
decreaseBrushOpacity.desc: Decreases the opacity of the canvas brush

increaseBrushOpacity.title: Increase Brush Opacity
increaseBrushOpacity.desc: Increases the opacity of the canvas brush

fillBoundingBox.title: Fill Bounding Box
fillBoundingBox.desc: Fills the bounding box with brush color

mergeVisible.title: Merge Visible
mergeVisible.desc: Merge all visible layers of canvas
